dict.string:
You can tap the numbers at the side of preference slider cells to bring up a box for entry of an exact value.
The primary theme is the lowest priority theme, convo specific themes overwrite this, and contact specific colours overwrite the bubble colours defined by the theme.
Themes are stored in /var/mobile/Library/MCPro/Themes and can be shared with others and included in Cydia packages for others to download. Themes include all settings and the background image if one is used.
I have built the possibility for localisation into M.C. Pro, if you are able to provide any translation please contact me via email.
